title: Pumpkin Oatmeal Breakfast
directions: In a saucepan, bring almond milk or water to a boil and stir in oats, canned pumpkin and pumpkin spice. Reduce heat immediately and let the mixture simmer a few minutes, stirring until oats are cooked. Serve with a sprinkle of coconut flakes, chopped pecans, and/or drizzled maple syrup.
ingredients: maple syrup, nuts, and coconut flakes for garnish
